data.name: IT Pro Camp 2020
data.description: Putting on an event of this size takes a lot of people. To keep the costs down, we need generous people like you to volunteer your time. Sign up using the button below, As a Reward, all voluteers will be able to take the certification testing on Friday evening before the event. Now how cool is that…
